RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Mestrado em Quimica - Università degli Studi di Bari, Italy (2004) e Doutorado em Medical Biochemistry and Biology - Università degli Studi di Bari e University of Southern Denmark, Denmark (2008). Tem experiência na área de Quimica e Bioquímica, com ênfase em análises de proteínas com modificações pós-traducionais como fosforilação, glicosilação, acetilação e oxidação. As áreas de pesquisa são focadas na biologia do cáncer e parasitologia.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in chemistry from Univeristy of Bari, Italy and with a doctoral degree in medical biochemistry from the University Hospital of Bari, Italy. Posdoc at the Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, University of Southern Denmark. He is currently professor at the Department of Parasitology, University of São Paulo. Has experience in protein chemistry with special focus on analytical methods applied to protein on a large scale. His areas of expertise are: proteomics, post-translational modifications, cell signalling, mass spectrometry and plant proteomics.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: The cross-disciplinary projects have fascinated me since I started investigating cell surface proteins involved in cancer disease using mass spectrometry and chemical based approaches. I obtained my Ph.D. in Medical Biochemistry using mass spectrometry as a key detection technique to study the post-translational modifications of mitochondrial membrane protein complexes. Working in a leading MS oriented research group, I have benefited from access to state-of-the-art instrumentation improving my knowledge in the field of protein chemistry without forgetting the biological implications of my findings. My interest is focused on the analysis of post translational modifications such as glycosylation, phosphorylation, acetylation and oxidation using mass spectrometry-based approaches. These methods have a wide applicability in the scientific community. Moreover I have strengthen my teaching skills in several courses after Ph.D. completions. The life of an academic grows more complex with each passing decade, but certain things never change. An academic has two primary responsibilities of which neither should have a higher priority than the others; (a) teaching, both theoretical and practical and (b) research. Both facets offer different rewards and challenges. However, I believe that quality and enthusiasm in teaching results in quality and enthusiastic students who are interested in learning and researching. The quality of biomedical research has the potential to inspire students to develop a better understanding of their chosen field. It is very inspiring for me to be able to teach new students in my field and follow them from young tentative insecure students to confident graduate students with the ability to develop and to apply their knowledge and understanding of their field. Taken together the teaching and research part are fundamental in my career and should be developed in parallel.

ENDERECO-PROFISSIONAL.LOGRADOURO-COMPLEMENTO: Av. Prof. Lineu Prestes, 1374 - Edifício Biomédicas II - Sala 09

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Desenvolvimento de novas metodologias para analises de glicoproteínas
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Essa linha de pesquisa irá desenvolver e otimizar métodos para identificar e quantificar a glicosilação de proteínas. O objetivo é desenvolver métodos robustos, simples, acurados e seletivos e estarão disponíveis para a comunidade científica. As etapas de uma estratégia de glicoproteômica são: 1) extração das glicoproteínas das matrizes biológicas, 2) enriquecimento e remoção 3) análise de espectrometria de massa, 4) análise computacional e 5) validação funcional. Todas elas são fundamentais para garantir uma maior cobertura do glicoproteoma.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA-INGLES: Development of new technologies for the analysis of glycoproteins
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA-INGLES: This line of research will develop and optimize methods to identify and quantify protein glycosylation. The goal is to develop robust, simple, accurate and selective methods and will be available to the scientific community. The steps of a glycoprotein analytical strategy are: 1) extraction of glycoproteins from biological matrices, 2) enrichment and removal 3) mass spectrometry analysis, 4) computational analysis and 5) functional validation. All of these are essential to ensure greater glycoprotein coverage.

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Descoberta de mecanismos biológicos relacionados a interação patógeno-hospedeiro com enfoque em glicoconjugados em Trypanosoma cruzi
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Este projeto tem como objetivo identificar e quantificar a glicosilação de proteínas do T. cruzi, incluindo os intermediários e enzimas envolvidos especialmente na biossíntese de glicano ligado a N. A caracterização da glicosilação de proteínas em T. cruzi oferece a possibilidade para a descoberta de novos alvos terapêuticos para a doença de Chagas, bem como uma ferramenta para caracterizar as diferentes cepas de T. cruzi.
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA-INGLES: This research line is aimed at understanding the signalling pathways modulated during cancer metastasis using quantitative mass spectrometry-based approaches. In particular the cross-talk between protein glycosylation on the cancer cell surface and phosphorylation-mediated intracellular signalling pathways is elucidated. The quantitative site-specific analysis of protein modifications will allow a better understanding of the underlined cancer biology and will offer new therapeutic potentials for this deadly disease.

LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.TITULO-DA-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Descoberta e validação de biomarcadores em doenças infecciosas: novas tecnologia para o diagnóstico da doença de Chagas
LINHA-DE-PESQUISA.OBJETIVOS-LINHA-DE-PESQUISA: Este projeto visa isolar e caracterizar, por métodos baseados em espectrometria de massa, os antígenos da proteína do parasita presentes na urina de camundongos e pacientes com doença de Chagas crônicos. Esses antígenos serão testados posteriormente na urina de pacientes com doença de Chagas. Portanto, o projeto proposto tem muitas potencialidades de impacto para a comunidade e o sistema de saúde pública.

ENSINO.DISCIPLINA: Espectrometria de Massas Aplicada à Biologia Celular e Molecular

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: MYC: a regulator of exosome protein cargo?
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: This project is funding the exchange of students and researchers between my laboratory and the laboratory from Professor Arturo Sala at Brunel University. The idea is to build an interaction and study the exosome cargo in different bioluids such as plasma and urine from patients with neuroblastoma in order to define molecular markers for diagnostics.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Interpreting the cancer glycobiology through the inhibition of the glycosylation machinery using targeted nanoscale delivery systems and post-genomics techniques
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: My role in this study is to design nanoparticles for targeting breast cancer cells. After the synthesis and characterization of NP encapsulating siRNA towards sialyltransferases, quantitative mass-spectrometry analysis will be used to evaluate protein phosphorylation and sialylation sites of the cancer cells subjected to these nanodelivery systems.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: My role in this study is to design nanoparticles for targeting breast cancer cells. After the synthesis and characterization of NP encapsulating siRNA towards sialyltransferases, quantitative mass-spectrometry analysis will be used to evaluate protein phosphorylation and sialylation sites of the cancer cells subjected to these nanodelivery systems.

PARTICIPACAO-EM-PROJETO.NOME-ORGAO: Boston Public Latin School - Estados Unidos

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: In this project I have been involved in teaching science to children with the age between 11-14 at the Boston Public Latin School. The courses were held in the afternoon time from 15 to 18.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Investigation of the protein and lipid content of exosomes released from neuroblastoma cell lines with different metastatic potential.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: This project is devoted to improve and develop mass spectrometric methods for quantitative assessment of PTM-modified proteins in exosomes released from neuroblastoma cell lines. This analysis will be further correlated with th protein content of exosomes isolated from the blood of patient with neuroblastoma disease.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: This project is devoted to improve and develop mass spectrometric methods for quantitative assessment of PTM-modified proteins in exosomes released from neuroblastoma cell lines. This analysis will be further correlated with th protein content of exosomes isolated from the blood of patient with neuroblastoma disease.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Investigation of the protein and lipid content of exosomes released from neuroblastoma cell lines with different metastatic potential.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: A Novel Method for the Simultaneous Enrichment, Identification, and Quantification of Phosphopeptides and Sialylated Glycopeptides Applied to a Temporal Profile of Mouse Brain Development
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: A Novel Method for the Simultaneous Enrichment, Identification, and Quantification of Phosphopeptides and Sialylated Glycopeptides Applied to a Temporal Profile of Mouse Brain Development

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper describes for the first time an enrichment method to quantitatively and simultaneously study the sialylated and phosphorylated peptides in biological samples. We were able to identify more than 7000 unique phosphopeptides and more than 3000 glycopeptides in mouse brain tissue. This method is currently applied to several biological samples. In this paper I have conceived the original idea, performed the experiments, analyzed the data and wrote the manuscript.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Performance of Isobaric and Isotopic Labeling in Quantitative Plant Proteomics

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this paper we have compared two peptide chemical labeling techniques based on amine reactive tags. These methodologies were statistically evaluated in a proteomics setup applied to a real biological sample.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Characterization of Membrane-shed Microvesicles from Cytokine-stimulated  -Cells Using Proteomics Strategies
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Characterization of Membrane-shed Microvesicles from Cytokine-stimulated  -Cells Using Proteomics Strategies

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper describes the first study of β-cell-specific proteins associated with microparticles and exosomes released from β-cell upon cytokine stimulation. In addition, we quantified specific sites of protein phosphorylation and N-linked sialylation in proteins. This study allowed us to map the most distinctive changes between microvesicles generated during growth and after cytokine stimulation to several cell death and cell signaling molecules.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Proteomic profile of the nucellus of castor bean (Ricinus communis L.) seeds during development
Chemical Deamidation: A Common Pitfall in Large-Scale N-Linked Glycoproteomic Mass Spectrometry-Based Analyses
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Chemical Deamidation: A Common Pitfall in Large-Scale N-Linked Glycoproteomic Mass Spectrometry-Based Analyses

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper target an important point for the scientific community working on post-translational modifications and in particular with large scale N-linked glycoproteomics study. Indeed here we show the pitfalls that arise from the uncritical application of the current method for large scale analysis. In this paper I have conceived the original idea, performed the experiments and wrote the paper.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this paper we describe for the first time the simultaneous enrichment of phosphorylated and O-GlcNAcylated peptides. Using a novel chemically synthesized tag we were able to perform the double enrichment on a proteomics scale. In this paper I have conceived the original idea, performed the experiments and wrote the manuscript.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This papers describes the highly selective, robust and sensitive method to enrich sialylated peptides in different biological sources. It is a method that is currently applied to many laboratories.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: In this paper we have discovered for the first time the glycosylation of grape glycoproteins which were similar to known allergens. The findings of this paper have catalyzed the media worldwide. Indeed several newspaper and magazines have reported the findings of this article.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper shows for the first time a X-K-Y-X lysine acetylation motif in plants. Moreover this paper shows for the first time a comprehensive analysis of PTMs such as glycosylation, phosphorylation and lysine acetylation. In this paper I have conceived the original idea, performed and supervised the experiments and analyzed the data.

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Atividades de atenção à saúde humana

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Nov. 17, 2010 ? Scientists have identified a mysterious culprit that threatens headaches, stuffy noses, skin rash and other allergy symptoms when more than 500 million people worldwide drink wine. The discovery could help winemakers in developing the first low allergenic vintages -- reds and whites with less potential to trigger allergy symptoms, they say.
